1import { create } from "zustand"
     2import { persist } from "zustand/middleware"
     3import { createClient } from "@/lib/supabase/client"
     4
     5export type View = "task" | "dashboard" | "settings" | "taskList"
     6export type EnergyLevel = "peak" | "medium" | "low"
     7export type AITone = "encouraging" | "stoic" | "urgent"
     8
     9interface ModalState {
    10  commandPalette: boolean
    11  voiceReminder: boolean
    12  addTask: boolean
    13  menuDrawer: boolean
    14  stuckTask: boolean
    15  breakdown: boolean
    16  dailyPlanning: boolean
    17  shameFreeReset: boolean
    18  statModal: "streak" | "trust" | null
    19}
    20
    21interface Preferences {
    22  soundEnabled: boolean
    23  hapticEnabled: boolean
    24  confettiEnabled: boolean
    25  showTrustScore: boolean
    26  showStreak: boolean
    27  reduceAnimations: boolean
    28  theme: "dark" | "light"
    29  accentColor: string
    30  aiReasoningStyle: AITone
    31  autoBreakdown: boolean
    32  defaultDurationMinutes: number
    33  autoStartBreaks: boolean
    34}
    35
    36interface CelebrationContext {
    37  isVisible: boolean
    38  wasQuickWin: boolean
    39  wasOverdue: boolean
    40  wasFromBreakdown: boolean
    41  wasPostReset: boolean
    42  stepsCompleted: number
    43  taskTitle: string
    44}
    45
    46interface ResetState {
    47  lastResetDate: string | null
    48  resetCount: number
    49}
    50
    51interface AppState {
    52  // View Management
    53  currentView: View
    54  modals: ModalState
    55  editingTask: any | null
    56
    57  // Session State
    58  userEnergyLevel: EnergyLevel
    59  timerRunning: boolean
    60  timeLeft: number
    61  defaultTimerMinutes: number
    62  tasksCompletedToday: number
    63  lastPlanningDate: string | null
    64
    65  // Preferences State
    66  preferences: Preferences
    67
    68  // Celebration State
    69  celebration: CelebrationContext
    70
    71  // Reset State
    72  resetState: ResetState
    73
    74  // View Actions
    75  setView: (view: View) => void
    76  openModal: (modal: keyof Omit<ModalState, "statModal">) => void
    77  closeModal: (modal: keyof Omit<ModalState, "statModal">) => void
    78  openStatModal: (type: "streak" | "trust") => void
    79  closeStatModal: () => void
    80  closeAllModals: () => void
    81  setEditingTask: (task: any | null) => void
    82  navigateAndClose: (view: View) => void
    83
    84  // Session Actions
    85  setUserEnergy: (level: EnergyLevel) => void
    86  setTimerRunning: (running: boolean) => void
    87  setTimeLeft: (seconds: number) => void
    88  decrementTimer: () => void
    89  resetTimer: () => void
    90  incrementTasksCompleted: () => void
    91  completePlanning: () => void
    92  shouldShowPlanning: () => boolean
    93
    94  // Preference Actions
    95  updatePreference: <K extends keyof Preferences>(key: K, value: Preferences[K]) => void
    96
    97  // Celebration Actions
    98  triggerCelebration: (ctx: Partial<Omit<CelebrationContext, "isVisible">>) => void
    99  dismissCelebration: () => void
   100
   101  // Reset Actions
   102  shameFreeReset: () => Promise<{ success: boolean; message?: string }>
   103  isPostReset: () => boolean
   104}
   105
   106const initialModals: ModalState = {
   107  commandPalette: false,
   108  voiceReminder: false,
   109  addTask: false,
   110  menuDrawer: false,
   111  stuckTask: false,
   112  breakdown: false,
   113  dailyPlanning: false,
   114  shameFreeReset: false,
   115  statModal: null,
   116}
   117
   118const initialPreferences: Preferences = {
   119  soundEnabled: true,
   120  hapticEnabled: true,
   121  confettiEnabled: true,
   122  showTrustScore: true,
   123  showStreak: true,
   124  reduceAnimations: false,
   125  theme: "dark",
   126  accentColor: "cyan",
   127  aiReasoningStyle: "encouraging",
   128  autoBreakdown: false,
   129  defaultDurationMinutes: 25,
   130  autoStartBreaks: false,
   131}
   132
   133const initialCelebration: CelebrationContext = {
   134  isVisible: false,
   135  wasQuickWin: false,
   136  wasOverdue: false,
   137  wasFromBreakdown: false,
   138  wasPostReset: false,
   139  stepsCompleted: 0,
   140  taskTitle: "",
   141}
   142
   143const initialResetState: ResetState = {
   144  lastResetDate: null,
   145  resetCount: 0,
   146}
   147
   148export const useAppStore = create<AppState>()(
   149  persist(
   150    (set, get) => ({
   151      // Initial State
   152      currentView: "task",
   153      modals: initialModals,
   154      editingTask: null,
   155      userEnergyLevel: "medium",
   156      timerRunning: false,
   157      timeLeft: 25 * 60,
   158      defaultTimerMinutes: 25,
   159      tasksCompletedToday: 0,
   160      lastPlanningDate: null,
   161      preferences: initialPreferences,
   162      celebration: initialCelebration,
   163      resetState: initialResetState,
   164
   165      // View Actions
   166      setView: (view) => set({ currentView: view }),
   167
   168      openModal: (modal) =>
   169        set((state) => ({
   170          modals: { ...state.modals, [modal]: true },
   171        })),
   172
   173      closeModal: (modal) =>
   174        set((state) => ({
   175          modals: { ...state.modals, [modal]: false },
   176        })),
   177
   178      openStatModal: (type) =>
   179        set((state) => ({
   180          modals: { ...state.modals, statModal: type },
   181        })),
   182
   183      closeStatModal: () =>
   184        set((state) => ({
   185          modals: { ...state.modals, statModal: null },
   186        })),
   187
   188      closeAllModals: () => set({ modals: initialModals }),
   189
   190      setEditingTask: (task) => set({ editingTask: task }),
   191
   192      navigateAndClose: (view) =>
   193        set({
   194          currentView: view,
   195          modals: initialModals,
   196        }),
   197
   198      // Session Actions
   199      setUserEnergy: (level) => set({ userEnergyLevel: level }),
   200
   201      setTimerRunning: (running) => set({ timerRunning: running }),
   202
   203      setTimeLeft: (seconds) => set({ timeLeft: seconds }),
   204
   205      decrementTimer: () =>
   206        set((state) => ({
   207          timeLeft: Math.max(0, state.timeLeft - 1),
   208        })),
   209
   210      resetTimer: () =>
   211        set((state) => ({
   212          timeLeft: state.preferences.defaultDurationMinutes * 60,
   213          timerRunning: false,
   214        })),
   215
   216      incrementTasksCompleted: () =>
   217        set((state) => ({
   218          tasksCompletedToday: state.tasksCompletedToday + 1,
   219        })),
   220
   221      completePlanning: () =>
   222        set({
   223          lastPlanningDate: new Date().toDateString(),
   224        }),
   225
   226      shouldShowPlanning: () => {
   227        const state = get()
   228        const today = new Date().toDateString()
   229        return state.lastPlanningDate !== today
   230      },
   231
   232      // Preference Actions
   233      updatePreference: (key, value) =>
   234        set((state) => ({
   235          preferences: { ...state.preferences, [key]: value },
   236        })),
   237
   238      // Celebration Actions
   239      triggerCelebration: (ctx) =>
   240        set((state) => ({
   241          celebration: {
   242            isVisible: true,
   243            wasQuickWin: ctx.wasQuickWin ?? false,
   244            wasOverdue: ctx.wasOverdue ?? false,
   245            wasFromBreakdown: ctx.wasFromBreakdown ?? false,
   246            wasPostReset: ctx.wasPostReset ?? get().isPostReset(),
   247            stepsCompleted: ctx.stepsCompleted ?? 0,
   248            taskTitle: ctx.taskTitle ?? "",
   249          },
   250        })),
   251      dismissCelebration: () =>
   252        set({
   253          celebration: initialCelebration,
   254        }),
   255
   256      // Reset Actions
   257      shameFreeReset: async () => {
   258        const supabase = createClient()
   259        const {
   260          data: { user },
   261        } = await supabase.auth.getUser()
   262
   263        if (!user) {
   264          return { success: false, message: "Not authenticated" }
   265        }
   266
   267        try {
   268          const now = new Date().toISOString()
   269
   270          // Archive overdue tasks
   271          await supabase
   272            .from("tasks")
   273            .update({
   274              skipped: true,
   275              skip_reason: "shame_free_reset",
   276              updated_at: now,
   277            })
   278            .eq("user_id", user.id)
   279            .eq("completed", false)
   280            .eq("skipped", false)
   281            .not("deadline", "is", null)
   282            .lt("deadline", now)
   283
   284          // Archive already skipped tasks
   285          await supabase
   286            .from("tasks")
   287            .update({
   288              skip_reason: "shame_free_reset",
   289              updated_at: now,
   290            })
   291            .eq("user_id", user.id)
   292            .eq("skipped", true)
   293            .is("skip_reason", null)
   294
   295          // Reset streak but preserve total_completed
   296          await supabase
   297            .from("user_stats")
   298            .update({
   299              current_streak: 0,
   300              last_completed_date: null,
   301              updated_at: now,
   302            })
   303            .eq("user_id", user.id)
   304
   305          set((state) => ({
   306            tasksCompletedToday: 0,
   307            lastPlanningDate: null,
   308            currentView: "task",
   309            modals: { ...state.modals, shameFreeReset: false },
   310            resetState: {
   311              lastResetDate: new Date().toISOString(),
   312              resetCount: state.resetState.resetCount + 1,
   313            },
   314          }))
   315
   316          return { success: true }
   317        } catch (error) {
   318          console.error("[LifeOS] Shame-free reset failed:", error)
   319          return { success: false, message: "Reset failed. Please try again." }
   320        }
   321      },
   322
   323      isPostReset: () => {
   324        const state = get()
   325        if (!state.resetState.lastResetDate) return false
   326
   327        const resetDate = new Date(state.resetState.lastResetDate)
   328        const now = new Date()
   329        const hoursSinceReset = (now.getTime() - resetDate.getTime()) / (1000 * 60 * 60)
   330
   331        return hoursSinceReset < 24
   332      },
   333    }),
   334    {
   335      name: "lifeos-app-store",
   336      partialize: (state) => ({
   337        currentView: state.currentView,
   338        userEnergyLevel: state.userEnergyLevel,
   339        defaultTimerMinutes: state.defaultTimerMinutes,
   340        lastPlanningDate: state.lastPlanningDate,
   341        preferences: state.preferences,
   342        resetState: state.resetState,
   343      }),
   344    },
   345  ),
   346)

1import { NextResponse } from "next/server"
     2import { createClient } from "@/lib/supabase/server"
     3
     4export async function POST(request: Request) {
     5  try {
     6    const authHeader = request.headers.get("Authorization")
     7    const adminKey = process.env.ADMIN_API_KEY
     8
     9    if (!authHeader || !authHeader.startsWith("Bearer ") || authHeader.split(" ")[1] !== adminKey) {
    10      return NextResponse.json({ error: "Unauthorized" }, { status: 401 })
    11    }
    12
    13    const { email, newPassword } = await request.json()
    14
    15    if (!email || !newPassword) {
    16      return NextResponse.json({ error: "Email and password are required" }, { status: 400 })
    17    }
    18
    19    if (newPassword.length < 6) {
    20      return NextResponse.json({ error: "Password must be at least 6 characters" }, { status: 400 })
    21    }
    22
    23    const supabase = await createClient()
    24
    25    const { data: userData, error: userError } = await supabase
    26      .from("profiles")
    27      .select("id")
    28      .eq("email", email)
    29      .single()
    30
    31    if (userError || !userData) {
    32      return NextResponse.json({ error: "User not found" }, { status: 404 })
    33    }
    34
    35    const { error: updateError } = await supabase.auth.admin.updateUserById(userData.id, {
    36      password: newPassword,
    37    })
    38
    39    if (updateError) {
    40      console.error("[v0] Admin password reset error:", updateError)
    41      return NextResponse.json({ error: updateError.message }, { status: 500 })
    42    }
    43
    44    console.log("[v0] Password successfully reset for:", email)
    45
    46    return NextResponse.json({
    47      success: true,
    48      message: "Password reset successfully",
    49    })
    50  } catch (error) {
    51    console.error("[v0] Admin password reset error:", error)
    52    return NextResponse.json({ error: "Internal server error" }, { status: 500 })
    53  }
    54}
    55

    91      console.log("[LifeOS] Optimistic update done, remaining tasks:", remainingTasks.length)
    92
    93      try {

Perfect! Now I have a comprehensive understanding of the authentication implementation. Let me compile the summary:

## Authentication Implementation Summary - LifeOS Project

Based on my analysis of the codebase, here's a comprehensive inventory of all authentication-related files and patterns:

### **1. Auth Pages (User-Facing)**
| File | Purpose | What to Remove/Modify |
|------|---------|----------------------|
| `/app/auth/login/page.tsx` | Main login page with email/password + forgot password | Entire page if removing auth; reset link handler stays if needed |
| `/app/auth/sign-up/page.tsx` | Registration page with validation | Entire page if removing auth |
| `/app/auth/sign-up-success/page.tsx` | Confirmation message after signup | Entire page if removing auth |
| `/app/auth/reset-password/page.tsx` | Password reset flow from email link | Entire page if removing auth |
| `/app/auth/error.tsx` | Auth error boundary component | Keep for error handling or integrate into main error handler |

### **2. Supabase Integration (Backend)**
| File | Purpose | Usage Pattern |
|------|---------|---------------|
| `/lib/supabase/client.ts` | Browser Supabase client initialization | Used in all client components via `createClient()` |
| `/lib/supabase/server.ts` | Server-side Supabase client with cookie management | Used in API routes and server actions |
| `/app/api/admin/reset-password/route.ts` | Admin-only endpoint for password resets (requires `ADMIN_API_KEY`) | Bearer token validation |

### **3. Auth Checks & Protected Routes**
| Location | Auth Implementation | Details |
|----------|-------------------|---------|
| `/app/page.tsx` (lines 59-69) | `useEffect` auth check | Redirects unauthenticated users to `/auth/login` |
| `/hooks/use-tasks.ts` (lines 35-41) | `supabase.auth.getUser()` | Gets current user before fetching tasks |
| `/hooks/use-user-stats.ts` | User authentication check | Similar pattern to use-tasks |
| `/app/api/*` routes | Server-side user verification | Each API route calls `supabase.auth.getUser()` |

### **4. Sign Out/Logout**
| Component | Sign Out Implementation |
|-----------|------------------------|
| `/components/menu-drawer.tsx` (lines 21-25) | `supabase.auth.signOut()`  redirect to `/auth/login` |
| `/components/settings-screen.tsx` (lines 88-96) | Handles both demo mode logout and auth logout |

### **5. State Management with Auth**
| File | Role |
|------|------|
| `/lib/stores/app-store.ts` (lines 257-321) | `shameFreeReset()` function uses `supabase.auth.getUser()` for user verification |

### **6. Demo Mode (Authentication Bypass)**
| Location | Pattern |
|----------|---------|
| `/app/auth/login/page.tsx` (lines 100-103) | `localStorage.setItem("lifeos_demo_mode", "true")`  redirects to `/app/demo` |
| `/app/demo/page.tsx` | Full app experience without authentication |
| `/components/settings-screen.tsx` (lines 54-62) | Checks `isDemo` prop to skip auth checks |

### **7. Environment Variables Required**
```
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL
NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
ADMIN_API_KEY (for admin password reset endpoint)
```

## Key Auth Flow

```
User  Login Page  Supabase Auth
  
Creates Session Cookie
  
Redirects to "/" (Home)
  
checkAuth() validates session
  
Fetches user-scoped data (tasks, stats)
```

**Demo Mode Bypass:** `localStorage["lifeos_demo_mode"]`  skips all auth checks

---

## Important Dependencies
- `@supabase/ssr` (browser + server clients)
- `@supabase/auth-js` (auth functionality)
- Supabase project with enabled auth providers

All auth is Supabase-based with no custom auth implementation.
